description:
Data loaded from the PanCancer Atlas initiative on the GDC in April 2018. Contains Sample Quality Annotations. This file was created by merging the annotations available in the DCC annotations database with manually curated lists of issue samples.   

More details: https://www.synapse.org/#!Synapse:syn4551248 
and 
https://gdc.cancer.gov/about-data/publications/pancanatlas , file:merged_sample_quality_annotations.tsv

fields.description: TCGA barcode identifier for the study participant, eg TCGA-02-0001
fields.name: patient_barcode

fields.description: TCGA study abbreviation, eg LAML. Full list available at https://gdc.cancer.gov/resources-tcga-users/tcga-code-tables/tcga-study-abbreviations
fields.name: cancer_type

fields.description: Platform used to generate this data, eg. HumanMethylation450, HumanMethylation27, IlluminaHiSeq_RNASeqV2, etc
fields.name: platform

fields.description: Indicates if participant barcode was excluded because of pathology, according to the TCGA Analysis Working Group. Takes values of null, "1.0" (excluded), or "0.0" (non excluded)
fields.name: AWG_excluded_because_of_pathology

fields.description: Describe the reazon of exclusion when AWG_excluded_because_of_pathology = "1.0"
fields.name: AWG_pathology_exclusion_reason

fields.description: Indicates if participant barcode was reviewd by the expert pathology committee. Takes values of null, "1.0" (excluded), or "0.0" (non excluded).
fields.name: Reviewed_by_EPC

fields.description: Boolean variable that indicates wether aliquot barcodes were flagged as "do not use" by the TCGA PanCancer Atlas Consortium
fields.name: Do_not_use
